short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: allows user to store current set of tabs into a storage, and open them at will. Ex: Entertainment layout,  etc

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to group and store tabs into one "bookmark". When user clicks "submit", the Tab Grouper saves all URLs in the current window under a chosen name. This is extremly useful in the case where the user has a set of tabs that are necessary to perform a task. For studying, a user might frequently have their school website, email, e-books and some specific websites open. Opening all these different tabs before each study session is time-consuming, and can be replaced with the click of a button.
